participant_1.background:
I threw a huge party to celebrate my new freedom.
I haven't worked at my current job for very long, because I just moved to Vienna.
I'm an adult who likes to have some time to myself.
I am close to my mother and love to spend time with her.
i m bored with my current lifestyle.

participant_2.background:
I wake up early to make breakfast for my children.
I used to drink chocolate milk shakes with my friends on hot summer days.
my mother is a ballet dancer.
i can never decide between a chili corn dog and a cheesy hot dog.
I just finished baking a batch of my famous chocolate chip cookies for my family.

content.text: Hey, I'm doing great! Just finished baking a batch of my famous chocolate chip cookies. How are you?
Oh that's awesome! I love chocolate chip cookies. I'm doing well, just a little bored with my current lifestyle.
I recently moved to Vienna and haven't really made any friends yet.
Oh, that's tough. I know how you feel. I moved to a new city a few years ago and it took me a while to make friends.
Yeah, it's been a little lonely. But I'm trying to stay positive and meet new people.
That's good! I'm sure you'll make some friends soon.
Hey, I have an idea. Why don't you come over for dinner tonight? I can make you some of my chocolate chip cookies and we can hang out.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'd love to come over.
